channel.title: >*| anyone who plays slomiscape must read this, or you will regret it! |*<
channel.description:
I regret to inform everyone that my server will be permanently crashed, never again to be rebooted, in 2 days. I will post my reasons below, but I thought I might as well post this, just to let you all know.
Many people have been trying to hack into our computer through the forwarded port, 5555. The trojan, ServeMe, is the one that is try the most and hardest. It attempts roughly every 10-20 seconds. It has thousands of ip-addresses, each attempt has it's own address, probably ping addresses. It's destroying our picture on our monitor, makes the computer slow, and takes up huge amounts of space; like 20% worth. If anyone has any info on this problem, help would be appreciated.
In case help doesnt arrive, as my last words,
Bye all, it was great while it lasted.

@aber wrote:

oh man theres tons of thoses that poped up on my server but my nortan anti virus poped up and said its been blocked wow thats scary how fucking people actully do these stuff i feel sorry for you wow this players can burn in hell
-aber

Read full topic

item.title: >*| anyone who plays slomiscape must read this, or you will regret it! |*<
item.dc:creator: @jonyo jonyo
item.description:
@jonyo wrote:

:eek: ouch sorry dude this happened to me and completely freaked the crap out of me… it was syipkedpkr he made tons of user names very rapidly and I had to shut down server for 20 minutes to fix it… just do a search in your server folder for all the character’s names that are spamming you and get every single one of their ip addresses and ip ban them.

Read full topic
